meico.mei

Class Helper

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.mei.Helper

  • public class Helper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for mei to msm conversion to hold temporary data, used in class Mei. It contains functionality that is also useful in other (mostly XML-related) contexts.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt.

    • Constructor Summary

      static int addToMap(nu.xom.Element addThis, nu.xom.Element map)
      this method adds element addThis to a timely sequenced list, the map, and ensures the timely order of the elements in the map; therefore, addThis must contain the attribute "date"; if not, addThis is appended at the end

      copies the id attribute ofThis into toThis

      private static nu.xom.Attribute copyIdNs(nu.xom.Element ofThis, nu.xom.Element toThis)
      copies the id attribute from ofThis (if present) into toThis, retaining its namespace

      • addToMap

        public static int addToMap(nu.xom.Element addThis,
                           nu.xom.Element map)
        this method adds element addThis to a timely sequenced list, the map, and ensures the timely order of the elements in the map; therefore, addThis must contain the attribute "date"; if not, addThis is appended at the end
        Parameters:
        addThis - an xml element (should have an attribute date)
        map - a timely sequenced list of elements with attribute date
        Returns:
        the index of the element in the map or -1 if insertion failed

      • updateMpmNoteidsAfterResolvingRepetitions

        public static void updateMpmNoteidsAfterResolvingRepetitions(GenericMap map,
                                                             java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> noteIdMappings)
        When articulationMaps are expanded via GenericMap.applySequencingMap() the noteid attribute is not updated. Therefor, we get a HashMap from Msm.resolveRepetitions() and apply it to the already expanded articulationMap via this method. It is used in classes meico.app.gui.DataObject and meico.app.Main. At the moment of invoking this method the maps have been expanded and only the noteids need to be updated.
        Parameters:
        map -
        noteIdMappings -

        Returns:

        private static java.lang.String durationRemainder2UnicodeDots(double undottedNoteValue,
                                                              double remainder)
        This is a helper method for decimalDuration2HtmlUnicode(). From a decimal duration value, take the undotted note value and the remainder. This method computes the number of dots and
        Parameters:

        remainder -
        Returns:

      • pname2midi

        public static double pname2midi(java.lang.String pname)
        converts an mei pname to a midi pitch number in the first midi octave
        Parameters:
        pname - the pname string
        Returns:
        the midi pitch number in the first midi octave (one octave below the first MEI CMN octave)

      • midi2pname

        public static java.lang.String midi2pname(double midipitch)
        converts a midi pitch value to a pitch name string (which inclused enharmonic equivalents)
        Parameters:
        midipitch - the midi pitch value
        Returns:
        the pitch name string

      • midi2PnameAndAccid

        public static void midi2PnameAndAccid(boolean useSharpInsteadOfFlat,
                                      double midipitch,
                                      java.lang.String[] pnameAccid)
        convert a midi pitch value to a pitch name string witout accidental, the accidental will be ecoded in a separate string; this method is used during MIDI to MSM conversion in class meico.midi.Midi2MSMConverter
        Parameters:
        useSharpInsteadOfFlat - use sharp or flat for accidental?
        midipitch - the midi pitch value
        pnameAccid - the output pitch name without accidental, the output accidental string (MSM style)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
